name: Galeão's Dreams Alpha
description:
The game of the dream of GALEÃO!

ALPHA - Some options in-game are desabled

Story:

Galeao is a brazilian teenager with a lot of troubles in his life, so one day he slept and dreamed that he was in GalopaLand and in that place he is the hero of the village and has to save everyone from the terrible villain, Peter...

Controls:

[A] to walk LEFT

[D] to walk RIGHT

[Space] to JUMP
